what:
Wrapper function for a bayesian mixed model, analysis and plots
can be given an already generated model, or will run it
with data and specified dvname, conditions and groups
In ... can pass variables to bayes_mm_mainFX or bayes_mm_interact and pirateye for plotting — bayes_mm

what: Output plot and means table for interactions. Can plot discrete or continuous factors. Can be passed plotting variables for pirateye — bayes_mm_interact
title: Output plot and means table for interactions. Can plot discrete or continuous factors. Can be passed plotting variables for pirateye — bayes_mm_interact
text: Output plot means table interactions. Can plot discrete continuous factors. Can passed plotting variables pirateye

title: Output plot and means table for interactions. Can plot discrete or continuous factors. Can be passed plotting variables for pirateye — bayes_mm_interact
code: bayes_mm_interact(   bmm,   interacts = NULL,   binom = F,   title = NULL,   pred_values = NULL,   ribbon = T,   ladder = F,   spark = F,   slopes = T,   mfx_sideplot = F,   ylim = NULL,   ... )

title: Output plot and means table for interactions. Can plot discrete or continuous factors. Can be passed plotting variables for pirateye — bayes_mm_interact
text: bmm needs bayes mixed model object (list one start) interacts interactions want plot : separating, gives void pred_values continuous variables, vector values predictions made. Defaults 10 equally spaced steps ribbon shades area evidence lines different ladder writes MPEs predicted value spark plots MPEs predicted value main plot mfx_sideplot puts density plot main effects side continuous variable ... pirateye plotting parameters

text: output plot means table main effects. Can passed plotting variables pirateye

title: output plot and means table for main effects. Can be passed plotting variables for pirateye — bayes_mm_mainFX
code: bayes_mm_mainFX(   bmm,   mainfxs = NULL,   binom = F,   xlabpos = 1.1,   title = NULL,   mainFXcomposite = T,   denplot = F,   pirate_diffplot = F,   ... )

title: output plot and means table for main effects. Can be passed plotting variables for pirateye — bayes_mm_mainFX
text: bmm needs bayes mixed model stanreg object (list one start) mainfxs vector main effect conditions plotted, defaults mainFXcomposite make composite pirate plot main effects denplot also give density plot individual main effects pirate_diffplot give pirate difference plot individual main effects

and nested factors (groups).Uses rstanarm — bayes_mm_run

code: bayes_mm_run(   data,   dvname,   conditions,   groups,   f = NULL,   mmtype = "intercept",   binom = F,   adapt_delta = 0.8,   shiny = F,   iter = 2000 )

title:
Runs Bayesian hierarchical mixed model with up to three conditions
and nested factors (groups).Uses rstanarm — bayes_mm_run
text: data data long format dvname column name DV conditions 3 conditions groups set random factors f formula, omitted generated mmtype default random intercepts, can 'slopes' binom true uses binomial / logit family adapt_delta defults 0.8, can get closer 1 convergences probs iter iterations model run
